name: 50s style full skirted netted glitter dance dress
description:
This bespoke dress is lovely, displayed with a full 50s slip under it.  However, it does have its own red netted slip and lining.  Back zip, not metal, sweetheart neckline, so inclined to think its an 80s take off, but all the same, a lovely dress for partying.
fits a 10 - 12, displayed on a 10 mannequin. 
bust 17" 
waist 15 
[both laid flat]
full hips. 
34 lenght. 

inside the lining has afew loose bits of cotton which need trimming out.

name: 60s.70s plus size dress coat
description:
this is a lovely coat, no label, could be professionally made. The colour is a deep turquoise and the coat has an embroidered detailing to the collar, although this is plain, it looks lovely.  would fit a 16 - 18.
lined front, not designed to be done up.

name: Monsoon Twilight 80s beaded and lace top 12
description:
Really lovely black lace and beaded top from Monsoon twilight. lined and measures 21" in length and 18" across the bust laid flat,...pulls over head.
would fit a 10 -1 2

name: 80s chunky jumper
description:
great batwing sleeve chunky jumper from the 80s, black background with a blue design, deep rib at the hem, can be worn, pulled down or up around the waist. 
size 10 - 14.

name: 80s festival style / hippy style velvet jacket/bolero
description:
Great velvet jacket with hippy styling, braid at all hems, sequin design on the lowers, lovely velour in a burnished purple, 'flashback couture' probably a modern take on the 60s.  Looks great with a maxi dress or jeans. 
lose fit, 10 -12

name: Fun 50s short apron,
description: great little apron, pocket at the front and frilled. Needs a run of elastic to the waist, although it still works!

name: Jaeger cocktail dress 1980s
description:
Simple, yet effective, Jaeger cocktail dress in velvet and crepe.  Straight style, with velvet bodice and straps, with a crepe skirt. fully lined. back zip. 
rayon and viscose, 
size 14, 
37" bust
39" hips 
as labelled. 
very good condition

name: Black Velvet Evening Jacket 1970s/early 80s
description:
Heavy quality black velvet evening jacket with pretty buttons.  labelled as a 12, could fit a 14.  sewn down pockets, fitted, shoulder pads, button front. 

Fully fashioned front, nice item

name: Elizabeth Shelton 80s black lace cocktail dress
description:
This is a very good quality lace black, cocktail dress from the 80s.  It really is lovely. fitted, lined with back zip. sized as a 14, but please read the measurements. 

cute matching bag in handbags!

bust. 19" laid flat
waist 17" laid flat
hips 19" laid flat

length down the back seam 34"

short sleeves unlined.
kick split at the back 
viscose polymide and polyester.

name: Ariella of London 1970s maxi purple velour
description:
Stunning maxi dress, so simple but so flattering; long sleeve, deep v front and fitted styling make this the ideal dress. 
The fabric is a deep colour with an irredescent sheen so that it catches the light. 
Shown with models own belt


there is some stretch to the fabric. 
bust: bust 18" laid flat
under bust 15" 
underarm tohem 16"
length down the back seam is 57

name: Monsoon Twilight 1980s shot silk mini skirt
description:
Bought from Monsoon in the early 1980s this is a shot silk purple irridescent mini skirt.  Barely worn, lined. 
17" length
14" laid flat waist.
fitted over the hips 
back zip

name: Edwardian or early 20th Century dress/top GAtsby era?
description:
This is a lovely piece of vintage history, we believe [see below] it to have originally been part of an edwardian or early 1920's dress, possibly the top that would have sat over a straight 'hobble; skirt.  It would be great for a gatsby party!
The top is velvet on cotton, machine stitched, with a side fastening of poppers. this material is semi sheer. ths skirt is a crepe fabric cut in handkerchief style. There are a few catches to the crepe fabric, 
16" across the bust
16to the drop waist. 

we got it from an antique place who believed that it was as stated above.

name: 80s black velour cross over top plus size
description:
Lovely plus size velour cross over top, no label, cut out by previous owner.  built in piece at front over the bust, low mock cross over and ties at the side, pull over head. 
bust. 21" laid flat
waist: 19 laid flat
back length 22 
seems unworn.

name: Frank Usher 70s maxi dress
description:
Purple irredescent material maxi dress from Frank Usher, Grecian style front, with gathered detailing at the back of the bodice, thin shoulder straps, easily altered.  Photos picked up the light, its a very rich purply colour, not light
material triacelyate and nylon, gorgeous colour, very good vintage condition. 
Lenght is 59" approx from top of strap to hem.
shown on a 10 mannquin, about 1" of the zip wouldn't quite do up over the bust, but if you are a 10 it depends on your sizing!

name: 1960s early 70s Dereta lurex, brocade maxi skirt
description:
This skirt is so well made, labelled as a 10, but check the measurements: 
wasit 12 - 13 laid flat [zip at the side and hook and eye]
hips 18"
length 40
lined
condition is excellent. heavy weight, brocade style, slightly embossed glitter design.

name: Vintage 1960s bespoke lurex brocade and satin mini dress
description:
This is a lovely dress from the 1960s.  hand made, but very well done, it has a gorgous deep emerald green satin skirt with bow at the front nad the bodice is a brocade lurex gold glitter. 
it looks fabulous on. 
metal back zip
pit to pit 16"
under bust 14"
length from under bust 22" 
unlined.
Short sleeve

name: 1970's Lurex Maxi skirt [C&A brand]
description:
This is a great item,  the skirt has an elastic waist, and quite a flare on it, so it really swings when you walk.  No pulls to the fabric, very sparkly and would fit a 8 - 12 comfortably.
waist 13 -18 [laid flat, stretched to unstretched.]
hips free.
length 41"
hem about 55" laid flat. so a good swing on it! 
Fabric is nylon and polymide
'label new fast' C&A
MORE PHOTOS TO FOLLOW

name: 1980s black velour dress with glitter incrusted shawl drop collar
description:
This dress is so 80's.  big deep drop shoulders with 'diamond' encrusted around them.  straight dress, in black velour, makers label removed by previous owner. Long sleeves, 
Fits onto the size 10 mannequin well. 
lenght. about 28", to hem, bit tricky because of the shoulder! 
Arm length 15" to hem.
pulls over head

looks very good on.

name: Vintage 50s hat M'sier Leon
description:
Great little almost pixie hat, could imagine Audrey Hepburn wearing this! The label only give the make, no details of fur.   It does feel like real fur, so possibly rabbit? not sure. soft felt like lining, with a few little bits that look like scratch marks.  overall the hat is great, unsual. There is an inprint at the top inside of the hat, looks like it says 'imported', but can't work out the rest. 
7" high to the point inside
about 20 - 21" circumference.

name: Damart Vintage winter hat Rabbit fur
description:
Rabbit fur and nylon,  designed by Damart and labelled as a thermal hat, flat top, slight brim, neat little unlined hat. 21" circumference, [approx]
good vintage condition, no stains, tears or rips.

name: Vintage faux fur hat
description: Traditional style faux fur hat, with a small bow at the back, no stains and all clean inside. measures 21" about circumference [tricky to measure] Cotton lined, styled like a 'russian' 60s hat.

name: 1980s does 50's Dolcis glitter shoes
description:
Highly glittery shoes from Dolcis, they have the 50s styling, but are 80's.  In very good condtion, marked up as a 41/2 would fit a 5, but no bigger. 
about 4" heel height

name: 1950s pointed toe lace shoes
description:
Great 1950s black lace shoes, the makers name has faded, but think they were gaylord or similar. These are swiss lace, fantasia III.  The condition is very good, no tears to the lace or nicks to the leather.  Sizing a 5 - 6, as there is some give on thelace. 
measurements: 
9.5" from the toe [not the very point] to the heel inside.
3.5 -4" across the widest point at the end of toes.
2.5 kitten style heel, 
little wear

name: 1960s brocade glitter shoes by Gaymode
description:
these shoes are lovely, they are narrow so I've measured them with a tape measure to help size them. 
9" from inside the toe to inside the heel,
2.5" widest point across the base of the toes
heel height 3" 
i would say they are a narrow 4 
inside leather, I would lift out the old inner sole and put in a new one.

name: Frank Usher 80s Beaded Top
description:
Frank Usher Beaded top size S, this is displayed on a size 10 mannequin, and would fit a narrow 12, padded shoulders as per 80s style, incredible beading and pattern, really glitters.
lovely item in great vintage condition

name: 1960s Pac a mac by Walstar, fantastic condition
description:
1960's brown Pac-a-mac, great condition, ideal for Vintage Lovers.
Label says Walstar featherfold, washable showerproof, nylon
No size to these as they were unsized, this is brown, no tears or problems, two side pockets, buttons to top, all work, great vintage item.

name: 70s Fake Fur Coat
description: Great coat will fit a 12 - 14, has hooks at the front, fastens upto the neck, panelled look to the pelts, not real fur, inside there are a few areas that need attention, but outside everything is excellent. Two side pockets, lovely and warm.

name: 80s Black Glitter jumper with red lurex thread
description:
Great glitter jumper, bought in Berlin, acryllic, 1980s soft fabric, no issues. 
wide sleeves ribbed cuff and deep ribbed waist.  Jumper slightly blouson as was the 80s style!
good stretch.
waist 13-19" laid flat. 20" long
Crew neck.
22" pit to pit.

name: LIz Claibourne Evening Jacket/bolero matches dress
description:
Stunning  jacket, bolero with irridescent beads on a cream crepe fabric.  Fully lined in cream satin finish. 
This is a fantastic jacket, matches the long evening dress with same beading detail.
Can be purchased as a set. 
Sized as an 8, may be American sizing, shown on a 10 mannequin best fit for a full busted 10 or a 12. #
Sleeve under arm to hem 16"
length of jacket is 16"
no fastening, 
Back is plain, but styled with panelled seams. Dress shown in photos, and listed seperately

name: 1970s full skirted St Michael Nightdress
description:
This is Hollywood glammar as shown by St Michael in 1970s, gorgeous deep brown nightdress 100% polyester, but satin finish, with deep beige lace inserts.  Hangs beautifully, no stains or issues. 
States size 36", but would fit a 10 - 12.  
More pictures to follow
16" under the bust
17 -18 round the bust,
full over hips.

name: Kayser Pink 60's Bed Jacket
description:
This is a great example of a 60's bedjacket, by Kayser.  Baby PInk, size WX, fits the 10 mannequin and a size 12.  Lovely shawl neck overlayin the button up front, [one button missing at the top], no stains or problems, Great item. 
3/4 sleeves. 10" under arm to hem, 7" at the base of the hem. 
10" under the arm to the base hem. 
slight swing back.

name: 1950s or earlier circular brooch with diamontes.
description: 1950's or earlier, circular brooch with a pretty design set with sparkling diamantes.  measures just over 1" across. No markings or makers name, locking pin.

name: 1960s artifical pearl & other stone leaf design brooch.
description: Open filigree leaf design brooch, probably 60's from the design. artifical pearls and other stone, all stones in place.  mounted into a silver mount with a locking pin on the back.

name: 1950s Style Diamonte Brooch
description: 1950s Style [may be original but not sure] diamonte in a bow design.  All stones inplace. measures 2" x 1" no markings, back has a lock on the pin.

name: 1960s souvenier fan from Hong Kong
description:
great little paper fan from The Mandarin Hotel in Hong Kong, bought with some BOAC fans and we were assured they were bought during travels in the 1960s.  Would make a good decoration or quirky present. 
The hotel opened 50 years ago, so dates do tie up. 
It is in great condition, lists the various bars, has a picture of Hong Kong from the past in sepia on the back. pink tassel, measures. just over 8" high.

name: Grey 1980s work bag
description:
Great bag for work, zip outside pocket, well designed, faux leather, 

Made by Brenton of Bury, two strong handles, inside pocket pvc in the middle with sturdy zip. Zip outside pocket and cip to the top.
no obvious marks or faults. 

13" across
16" high including handles. 
4.5" across the base.

name: 1960s faux leather tote style bag
description:
Great and roomy tote style bag, really looks good.  Made of a type of plastic, probably PVC,  can be wiped clean.  Inside the label has gone and there are two marks where it was. There are a few small stains inside, and a tiny rip to the lining where it is rubbed by the back of the clasp.  See photos, 
widest point across 13"
height including handles is 14"
base across is 6", narrower at the top. 
Slight red mark to the sides, which I suspect will come off with a clean. [see photo]

name: 1950s Kelly Bag
description:
Neat 50's Kelly Bag in brown leather and lined in suede. Label says 'Riviera Bag Made in England'   A few little marks on the front, which I suspect would polish out, also inside, although it appears to have had little wear the main pocket is lose, see photos.  mirror pocket and zip pocket all good.
Priced accordingly.  
Clasp good all working
11" across, x 13" high including handles. 
Base 2.5" 4 brass feet.

name: Edwardian /20's camisole top
description:
Cotton camisole top, quite plain, but well made. plain but pretty, lace trim with faded pink embroidery. button front with two buttons, one coverd other one not.  Draw string waist creates a small frill. mix of machine stitching and very small neat hand stitches. 
An little gem of a top. no stains.
measurements. 
pit to pit 20" flat.
Waist 17" flat.
shoulder to hem 17"

name: 1960s Fold Up Combs Brand new.
description:
Found in a warehouse, some of these match the compacts.  These are a plastic comb and it folds into the metal case, great for the handbag. 
Folded these measure 4", they have a design on the front, polished brass look on the back.  tortoiseshell style plastic small tooth comb folds out
all new.

name: 1930's bra
description:
Lovely cotton bra, with label inside and all the hooks and eyes.  
The label says 'VENUS' and the initials HJ are sewn ito the side [previous owner!].  The front has two 5" inserts which may have been a type of elastic , but have no stretch now.  the fabric is embroidered, two straps are sound, but are slightly frayed. 
measures.
under bust 16" flat.
6" under arm to hem. 
pit to pit 17" 
6 hooks, one missing.
all eyes present. 
clean item, no stains.

name: 1950s or early 60s Musical Manicure Box with wind up ballerina
description:
Probably 1950s, large manicure box, like a jewellery box, with a mirror and ballerina, most of the pots and the nail items are there, but they are not matching.   It is a musical box, but the winder is stuck.

This box measures 8" x 9", it has a flat back, probably to go against a dressing table.  The pattern is on a pink background, slightly lighter on the top than the sides of the box.
There are two brass clasps to front.  No damage to outside of box.
inside is lined with cream satin, mirror has no chips, a couple of very small age spots, which barely show as the satin is gathered.  The tweezers and scissors are new, the remainder of the pieces are from 50's manicure sets, the two round containers are from this box.  The ballerina is in one piece, but doesn't turn.  
Great item.

name: 1960s small brand new compacts various colours
description:
These were found in a warehouse, all unused with the original dust covers.   Some have matching fold away combs, also new.

Compacts are polished metal brass look with push fastening at the front.  Tops have design.  Inside one mirror, unused, but have been stored for 50 years! Dust covers just felt with machined sides, some are dusty.  Mirrors are a little loose, but this is in all of them, they seem to stay in.  
Measure. 7cm x 6cm.

name: Silver Glitter Coin Purse, Vintage Style
description:
This is the cutest little coin purse, absoloute miniture of a real 50s bag. It is small so please look at the measurements. 

3.5" across, 
2" high, 4" if you include the handle. 
New and usused. 

probably 90s, may be more modern, but a great gift for vintage lovers.

name: Small black lace evening bag
description:
Black lace evening bag, probably 80s - 90s, unused, only label says 'made in china'. 
Bag measures 4" x 8" at the widest point, handles make it a total of 8" high. 
Inside is black, 2 sections, one with zip pocket.  One side pops closed, one zips, 
there are two hooks for a long handle, not with it.

name: Berkshire 50s or 60 mesh/fishnet stockings new.
description: Berkshire 30 denier fully fashioned textured mesh brown stockings, new and usued in the original pack.

name: brown silk feel handmade scarf 60s fabric
description: Brown silk feel scarf, hand stitched and no label, measures 10 x 37", may have been a tie around the neck for men, rather than a scarf.  Nice item.

name: Butterfly design scarf
description: great scarf, 54" long, 8" across, butterfly and toucan design at each end.  border flowers, cream colour acetate,

name: Twilfit Corset/girdle, could be 60s?
description:
Unused Twilfit Corset/girdle, age unknown, jusging from the label I would say its 60s, there are washing instructions, but as it says 'drip dry' I place it at the 60s
It is made of cotton and other fibres, designed to fit 28", but doesnt say if thats after use or before!!!
it is too big for the 10 mannequin. 
laid flat wasit 26"
hips 36
length 15
obviously can be altered from the lacing. 
great vintage condition, does not appear to have had any wear
4 sewn in stocking holders. 
4 massive hook and 3 standard hooks and eyes

name: EARly St Michael Slip Bri Nylon
description:
Early 60s label, for this slip, aquamarine colour, 36 length approx [depends on the alteration of the bra straps]

label says 38" M, its more like a 36" and measures 17 - 18" under the bust.  
In very good condition, does not appear to have had much wear.  There is a very small 1mm mark under the bust by the seam, which doesn't show and I suspect is a stroreage mark.
other wise no snags and definately wearable.

name: St Michael 1960's nightdress
description:
St Michael late 60's short polyester and cotton nightdress.  Label says 36" a 14, but please read measurements.  In very good vintage condition 
No fading to the fabric, lace and ribbons all good.  
26 Bust
length is 39"
under bust 18" laid flat

name: Edwardian/1920's handmade cotton chemise
description:
This lovely pure cotton chemise is probably late Edwardian or early 1920's.  It is beautifully made, shades of Downton Abbey! very wearable.  The back hem is shaped and higher than the front, to fit over the dresses of the time.  The front is pintucked to create the gathering for the bust.  There are 3 button holes that I can see, all are hidden under a front panel.  There are currently only 2 buttons. The front top is done up by a silk ribbon threaded through the lace, this needs replacing, but isn;t really needed. 
It is in remarkably good condition. 
Bust measures 32",
but the waist is very small, about 22, 
14" from shoulder to base of hem
Did not do up on the mannequin at the base, 
would fit a 6 to do up all the way down
an 8 - 10 to fit across the bust.
its a great item.

name: 1930s - 40s Silk Feel Rayon Nightdress
description:
late 30's early 40s American nightdress, in Rayon, but is quality is such that it feels like silk.  Its so Hollywood, the nightdress is designed to swirl at the base, very 30's.  
The label says Juliana, lingerie of quality, rayon fibre.

This would fit a small 10 or smaller frame.  It just went onto the mannequin, but the lace is delicate, more so than the rayon which seems very sound.  The lace needs restitching to the main garment in one place at the front.  
I have left this for the buyer as it only fair to sell as it is, not reconditioned. 
This is a fantastic piece of fashion history and should be worn occasionally with care.

name: American Pegnoir/negligee and nightdress set Maidenform
description:
This set came from America, it is an 80s set by Maidenform, but has real overtones of Hollywood in the 1930s, this seems to be brand new, would be the most amazing gift! Details to follow

The nightdress is stunning, embroidered back and front, on sheer fabric.  This embroidery is also on the sleeves of the negligee.  The set is full lenght about 49", and the nightdress has curved slits at both sides.  
Fabric feels like silk but is a good quality polyester.  Maidenform label to both, care instructions: cold wash, cool iron. 

Label size Small. 
bust 34
waist 36
hips free, [38 - 40.
measured flat with some slight stretch.

name: Bespoke shot silk 50s cocktail dress
description:
This is the most amazing dress, the shot silk is green, but when the light catches it the whole dress comes alive! The photos give an indication to this.  

The lady who owned this told us she had all her cocktail dresses professionally made and designed for her! and that the fabric was shot silk.
The fabric is quite stiff, gorgeous colour.
no zip, side poppers on opening [could easily have a zip put in], pulls over the head, slight slit at the back to facilitate this.
wasit 15" laid flat
hips 17" [pleats at hip]
bust [17"
lenght from top to hem is 44"
this has obviously been stored with great care as it seems as if new.  
embroidered front, green sparkle for leaves and shimmering white for flowers.

name: 1950s Lace full sweep cocktail dress
description:
Amazing lime green dress from America, this full sweep strapless boned bodice dress is in fabulous condition and looks great. It has been dispayed with a net slip [not included], but the lace is stiff and does stand out on its own. boned and gathered bodice with side zip. satin underskirt. 
size 10 mannequin. 
waist laid flat 13"
hip free, 
across the top of the bodice  16"
skirt length 28"
very slight staining to the inside front bust at the top, not noticeable outside and small area only.

name: Eleanor Simmons for Malcolm Starr 1960s heavily embossed/padded impression evening dress
description:
Incredible dress, very hard to describe.  This is a 60's empire line dress, in a slik style fabric which has embossing to it.  It gives the appearance of being padded, so very in vogue.  Definately a must for New Year, as it's heavy and warm, its a bit like old fashioned dressing gown satin fabric..
Under bust measurement 13.5"
pit to pit is just 17"
Metal working zip, hook and eye at top.
41" length from under bust seam to hem. 
Pleats at the front with hidden Side pockets
Hem across laid flat is 48"
very unusual vintage piece,.

name: 1960s fushia pink Jackie O style cocktail dress crepe silk
description:
Amazing bespoke Jackie O style cocktail dress form the 1960's. 
Very fushia pink, camera wouldn't pick it up so please email for further photos.  This dress is a head turner, the back has a long built in chiffon scarf that trails as you walk...the dress is lined and handmade with a good sized hem.  As its 60s it has a straight skirt which can easily be adjusted to suit the length that is required. 
Metal zip. 
Strap to waistband 12"
Waist 15" [laid flat]
Pit to pit 17"
skirt lenght from under the band 39"
slight fraying to the chiffon around the zip area, but doesn't show when on, only on inspection.

name: 1940s or later Heavily Beaded Peplum Maxi Evening Dress
description:
This dress is very difficult to date, the owner stated it was early 50's and it might well be.  I suspect its two items sewn together, the top is a peplum style heavily beaded long sleeved lined item, there once was a label which has been taken out. The skirt is a stiff taffeta and appears to be hand made.  Its a lovely item, which could look great with a shorter skirt or just the top with trousers. 
Mannequin size 10
BAck of neck to waist 15"
waist  15"
top lined , peplum and skirt are not. 
bust about 17 - 18" across laid flat
skirt full length, easy to alter.

name: 1940s /1950s Bespoke Gold Ball/prom/cocktail dress
description:
This incredible dress is unique: we suspect it was made during rationing as the fabric weight and pattern is similar to light weight upholstery fabric.  This is possibly silk, and is gold with an oriental design of pagodas, trees and boats.  It was modelled at the Farnham Maltings in June in their runway show.  It is incredible. 
The outside of the dress is perfect, but there is discolouration to the stiffened lining.  
WRap over at the bust, sewn down pleating at the waist to fit, slight tulip wrap effect at the front, full skirt, deep V back with metal zip, no labels, matching clutch bag in same fabric. Inside belt to help fit at waist.  bodice lined with satin.
Skirt length 29" 
bodice from strap to waist 15" 
WAist 12.5" flat
pit to pit 17"
displayed on a 10 mannequin.

name: 1960s beaded embellised blue top
description:
This stunning beaded top is a 1960s Jacqui O style.  It is brilliant for Xmas and New Year as it is surprisingly wool! It is covered in dwquins and pearl beads, It has a cotton lining and a metal zip. As a vintage item there is a little bit of the beading loose at the base, but it doesn't show.  Also the zip tends to stick at the base, but its not broken.  So if you are an 8 - 10 this will fit like a dream. The label says 'made in Hong Kong 100% wool]
length 20" 
pit to pit 17"
waist 16" 
flat across hem 17"
some slight stretch so can add 1"

name: 1960's Baby Blue lace & pleated American skater dress
description:
Refreshing baby blue skater dress, with a floral lace long sleeved cuffed top and circular pleated skirt. Its from America is an absolute delight, fabric, some sort of synthetic. 

Concealed back zip 

Bust - 34"
Waist - 26"
skirt length from waist - 23"

name: 1950's baby pink shirt with button back
description:
pastel pink 50's shirt with button back and paneling to the front, silk feel material.

size 10-12

Damage - there is a small rip to the back button hole and a small snag on the front of the shirt.

name: Peter pan crochet collar pastel yellow jumper 70s dies 40s
description:
70's does 40's Very cute pastel yellow woolen jumper with a lovely crochet peter pan collar and embroidery. It would work well for a 40s day!

size 8-10

PLEASE NOTE : there is some bobbling to the front of the jumper where the wool has been over washed/worn.

name: 70's brown and white floral print short sleeved skater dress
description:
brown and cream bold print floral skater dress, concealed zip. This is a polyester fabric, quite heavy, early 70s, no label. 

Waist - 32"
bust - 36"
length - 25"

name: Early 1960's brown and cream block color skater dress
description:
Brown and cream skater dress, with brown floral detailing to the bust.  Slight pleats in the circle skirt and concealed zip at the back.

please note:The dress is show with a full 1950's petticoat underneath but this is not included 

waist - 30"
Bust - 28"
Length - 24"

name: Bespoke drop waist 1950's summer dress
description:
Pink and white drop waist floral 1950's bespoke dress, with cap sleeve, side zip and full circle skirt

There are a few vintage wear marks to the dress (shown in the photos) however these could easily come out with a service at the dry cleaners 

Waist - 33" (free)
bust - 38"
Length - 24"

photos show the dress with a full petticoat underneath however this is not part in the dress and not included

name: Vibrant 50's bespoke summer dress
description:
stunningly vibrant spring/summer 1950's bespoke dress, with full circular skirt and sip back.

Perfect for those spring/summer days - dress up with a 1950's peticoat for an authentic look or wear without and pair with a lovely denim jacket to stay on trend this season

The dress has concealed pockets either side of the skirt 

waist - 30"
Bust - 38"
Length from waist - 24"

name: 80's batwing glittery dress
description:
1980's batwing black dress with sliver embossed glitter pattern, which is a mix of sequins and a white design on the fabric. This is an early Principles dress with small key hole back.
Typical 80s styling, loose top, very tight, bondage style base, measuring about 16" across the hem [laid flat]
No zip, pull on 
No care instructions, or fabric details, probably polyester
